body_html:
Most likely, when increase the number of concurrent, gpu kernels competition for resources has become frequent.
Maybe you can reduce the number of concurrent to balance qps and latency.
Also, you can try binding thread to different gpu streams, if tensorflow support.

body:
Most likely,  when increase the number of concurrent, gpu kernels competition for resources has become frequent.
Maybe you can reduce the number of concurrent to balance qps and latency.
Also, you can try binding thread to different gpu streams, if tensorflow support.
